title: With the watch and earn mission, do we have to connect our twitch account to our league account?
body:
Just wondering
Or do I have to do something else?

replies.body:
I don't know why I can't find anything on the website(link: https://watch.oce.lolesports.com/rewards  ).
Do you have the same problem?

All you need to do is go to the LoL ESports website (link: https://oce.lolesports.com/ ), log in and watch. You'll earn credit for watching at least 10 minutes of each 2018 World Championship Game, either live or VoD. You will also be able to track your progress real-time via the "Reward Hub". You can find more info on the watch missions by following this link: https://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/watch-missions-2018-world-championship
